meanings.sent1: The school held a fun tourney for the students to compete in.
meanings.sent2: She won the chess tourney by outsmarting her opponents.
meanings.sent3: The tourney was so intense that even the teachers were cheering loudly.
meanings.sent4: The annual spelling bee was a mental tourney for the students.
meanings.sent5: The soccer tourney left everyone exhausted but happy.

meanings.definition: To participate in a tournament or competition.
meanings.sent1: He decided to tourney in the upcoming basketball competition.
meanings.sent2: They trained hard to tourney in the dance-off at the community center.
meanings.sent3: She tourneyed in the cooking contest and surprised everyone with her skills.
meanings.sent4: The athletes will tourney in the relay race to showcase their speed.
meanings.sent5: The band members will tourney in the battle of the bands for a chance to perform at the festival.
